channel.title: billchandos.dev blog
channel.description: Development focused blog written by Bill Chandos, software developer.

item.title: On failure and finishing the job... Part 3 of dynamic widget
item.description: In trying to create a working demo of dynamic widgets, I discovered several issues! Join me as I attempt to address them.

item.title: Adding a controller for the dynamic web component
item.description: Join me again as I continue creating a generic web component that can load and refresh dynamic contents from the backend.

item.title: Creating your own VS Code server in a container
item.description: Join me as I setup a Docker container for running Code Server, an open source implementation of the VSCode back-end server.

item.title: Create a self-contained dynamic web component, part 1
item.description: Join me as I create a generic web component that can load and refresh dynamic contents from the backend.

item.title: Adding Weather Alerts to Vue App using Public API
item.description: Join me as I modify my basic weather application by adding weather alerts from the National Weather Service API

item.title: Add post tagging and recommendations to the blog
item.description: Join me as I add a tagging and post recommendation system to my static blog generator.

item.title: Adding an RSS feed to the statically generated blog
item.description: Join me as I add an RSS feed to my statically generated blog.

item.title: Building a Static Blog Generator
item.description: Join me as I create a basic markdown-to-HTML static blog generator using NodeJS on Github Pages.
